resources.string: Keep track of your dog\'s health
Check your pet\'s health and needs at any moment. You get alerts when your dgo isn\'t feeling his best.
Lock your leash or just locate where you left it
Advanced controls that make going out to a park or an a walk with your dog easy on both of you
Set reminders to never forget another dog duty
Manage yout dog responsibilities easily and share them with your family or flatmates
